sourcesContent:
import { Modal, show, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './CineMatch.css'; const API_IMG = "https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/"; const CineMatch = ({ title, poster_path, vote_average, release_date, overview, credits }) => { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const director = credits.crew.filter(member => member.job === 'Director')[0]; return (
{title}

Details

IMDb: {vote_average}

Release Date: {release_date}

Overview:

{overview}

Credits

Director: {director?.name}

Cast: {credits.cast.map(member => member.name).join(', ')}
) } export default CineMatch;
